pipelines_setup.overview: External server for heavy processing and complex workflows
installation_steps: Run Pipelines container: docker run -d -p 9099:9099 --add-host=host.docker.internal:host-gateway -v pipelines:/app/pipelines --name pipelines --restart always ghcr.io/open-webui/pipelines:main
Configure Open WebUI connection: Admin Panel > Settings > Connections
Add API URL: http://localhost:9099 (or host.docker.internal:9099 for Docker)
Install/manage pipelines: Admin Panel > Settings > Pipelines
